revised_title: Observations on the Death of a Dog from Gunshot and Polypus of the Lungs
tldr: The author shares two observations: one about a dog's death from a gunshot and another about a polypus of the lungs. In the first observation, a dog dies after being frightened by the sound of gunshots. In the second observation, a tailor describes coughing up strange, slimy objects that resemble polyps. The author seeks advice on these medical cases.
